main.name: Pranav Kulkarni
main.occupation: Masters Student of Software Engineering @ University of Maryland
main.description: I have strong interest in the field of Software Developement, AI/ML, Finance, Robotics, crypto-currency and any combination of these. I am proficient in JS, Python, C++, R,  and have an experience working in React/Redux, PostgreSql, Python Pandas and Node & express JS. I am currently looking for full-time positions in any of the following: Software developer, full-stack developer, React/Redux Js developer, Front-end developer, Back-end developer, JS/Python developer.
main.bio: I was born and raised in lovely city Pune, India. After my basic schooling there, I did my graduation from highly coveted Indian Institute of Technology Patna, India from department of Mechanical Engineering from 2012 - 2016.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Have undertaken courses in Software Architecture, requirements, Systems Engineering, AI Planning and Life-cycle cost estimation. Currently a graduate research assistant to Dr. Varaprasad Bandaru at Dept. of Geographical Sciences.
Received Director's 'Best Graduate Thesis Project Award 2016', Published a paper in American Society in ME and was selected in coveted MITACS Globalinks scholarship.
